speaker: Requiem
lines: You follow the draft down a corridor and stop in a quiet chamber.
You stand still and let the air settle.
You hold a silence long enough to hear your own breath.
You think of the graves above as doors that close well.
Nothing leaves and nothing is trapped.
A clean mark appears on your palm and fades.
A lantern goes out somewhere and the dark is at peace.
You turn back toward the world with a simple tune in your head.

give_item.name: Requiem
give_item.description: A rite that lays the restless and quiets the cruel
